hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#if [[ $OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT == "openEuler:22.03:LTS" ]] || [[ $OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT == "openEuler:22.03:LTS:Epol" ]];then # exit 0 #fi
sudo su - root <<FEOF
echo "nameserver 114.114.114.114" >> /etc/resolv.conf
yum install dnf-plugins-core -y --repo OS
FEOF
set +e git config --global user.email "80474298@qq.com" git config --global user.name "openeuler-ci-bot" git config --global pull.ff only
rm -rf ~/check_rpm_dep
for ((i=1;i<=5;i++)); do if [ ! -d ~/check_rpm_dep ];then set +e git clone --depth 1 https://gitee.com/wangchong1995924/openeuler-os-build ~/check_rpm_dep set -e else break fi done
if [[ ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT} =~ "Epol" ]];then p=${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT%:*} stand_repo_url="$(echo ${p//:/:\/})" st_repo_url="http://${OBS_SERVER_IP}:82/${stand_repo_url}/standard_aarch64" st_repo=`echo ${st_repo_url//\//\\\/}` epol_repo_url="$(echo ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT//:/:\/})" ep_repo_url="http://${OBS_SERVER_IP}:82/${epol_repo_url}/standard_aarch64" ep_repo=`echo ${ep_repo_url//\//\\\/}` sed -i "27cbaseurl=${st_repo}" ~/check_rpm_dep/script/config/repo_conf/obs-repo.conf sed -i "39cbaseurl=${ep_repo}" ~/check_rpm_dep/script/config/repo_conf/obs-repo.conf repo_name="obs-Epol" else stand_repo_url="$(echo ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT//:/:\/})" st_repo_url="http://${OBS_SERVER_IP}:82/${stand_repo_url}/standard_aarch64" st_repo=`echo ${st_repo_url//\//\\\/}` sed -i "s/baseurl=.*/baseurl=${st_repo}/g" ~/check_rpm_dep/script/config/repo_conf/obs-repo.conf repo_name="obs-standard" fi #cat ~/check_rpm_dep/script/config/repo_conf/obs-repo.conf date python3 ~/check_rpm_dep/script/tools/check_dep.py -d ~/check_rpm_dep/ -l ~/check_rpm_dep/allist -f ~/check_rpm_dep/check_dep.log -e ~/check_rpm_dep/script/config/unable_install_list -c ~/check_rpm_dep/script/config/repo_conf/obs-repo.conf -r ${repo_name} date
sudo su - root <<FEOF2 touch /root/.oscrc cat > /root/.oscrc << EOF [general] apiurl = http://117.78.1.88 [http://117.78.1.88] user = $OBS_USER pass = $OBS_PWD EOF
if [[ -s /home/jenkins/check_rpm_dep/script/config/unable_install_list ]];then rm -rf home:Admin:ISO osc co home:Admin:ISO cd home:Admin:ISO if [[ ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT} =~ "Epol" ]];then if [[ ! -d `echo ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT%:*} | sed s/:/-/g` ]];then mkdir `echo ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT%:*} | sed s/:/-/g` fi mv /home/jenkins/check_rpm_dep/script/config/unable_install_list ./`echo ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT%:*} | sed s/:/-/g`/unable_install_list_epol_aarch64 cd `echo ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT%:*} | sed s/:/-/g` && osc add unable_install_list_epol_aarch64 && osc update osc ci -n || osc update && osc ci -n else if [[ ! -d ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT//:/-} ]];then mkdir ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT//:/-} fi mv /home/jenkins/check_rpm_dep/script/config/unable_install_list ./${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT//:/-}/unable_install_list_standard_aarch64 cd ${OBS_STANDARD_PROJECT//:/-} && osc add unable_install_list_standard_aarch64 && osc update osc ci -n || osc update && osc ci -n fi
fi FEOF2
